parentQuestions.title: 18. How will the application be assessed?
parentQuestions.instruction:
A. To correctly fill in the assessment goals, it is not necessary to describe the goals pertaining to every usability attribute, but only to those that are relevant to the project.
B. To assure the clarity and precision of the assessment goals descriptions, please consider whether they have been clearly stated with specific objectives.

questions.title: 18.4 How much time will it require?

parentQuestions.title: 19. How will the design of the assessment be?
parentQuestions.instruction:
A. Name the possible steps.
B. Detail the steps.

parentQuestions.title: 20. Will the participants be able to ask questions during the assessment?
21. Will there be a pilot assessment?
parentQuestions.instruction: If the answer is 'YES', describe how the pilot will be conducted.
